name: PUMMEL PARTY
summary: Pummel Party is a 4-8 player online and local-multiplayer party game. Pummel friends or AI using a wide array of absurd items in the board mode and compete to destroy friendships in the unique collection of minigames.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 派对
  • 游玩人数: 4人~8人
  • 发行日期: 2019-09-21
  • 售价: $14.99
  • 开发: Rebuilt Games
  • 发行: Rebuilt Games
